units.name: Warboss
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: kombi-weapon; twin slugga; big choppa.

datasheet.name: Might is Right
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Da Biggest and da Best
datasheet.description: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, add 4 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons.|Datasheet||

units.name: Warboss In Mega Armour
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: big shoota; ’uge choppa.

datasheet.name: Might is Right
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Dead Brutal
datasheet.description: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, this model’s ’uge choppa has a Damage characteristic of 3.|Datasheet||

units.name: Warboss On Warbike
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin dakkagun; killsaw.

datasheet.name: Speedboss
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: High-octane Fuel
datasheet.description:
Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.|Datasheet||
000000004|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000004|2|000008346||||Core||
000000004|3|000003676||||Faction||
000000004|4|||Waaagh! Energy|While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.|Datasheet||
000000004|5|||Da Jump (Psychic)|Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one WEIRDBOY from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that WEIRDBOY’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove this WEIRDBOY’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.|Datasheet||

units.name: Weirdboy
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: ’Eadbanger; weirdboy staff.

units.name: Big Mek In Mega Armour
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom-mega blaster; power klaw.

datasheet.name: More Dakka
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Fix Dat Armour Up
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Kustom Force Field
datasheet.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Grot Oiler
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds.Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Oiler token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.|Wargear||

units.name: Big Mek On Warbike
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: slugga; twin dakkagun; choppa; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Kustom Force Field
datasheet.description: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: More Dakka
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Mekaniak
datasheet.description:
At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly ORKS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.|Datasheet||
000000008|1|000008346||||Core||
000000008|2|000003676||||Faction||
000000008|3|||Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!|While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll and if the Waaagh! is active for your army, a Critical Hit is scored on a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+.|Datasheet||
000000008|4|||Ghazghkull’s Waaagh! Banner (Aura)|While a friendly ORKS unit is within 12" of Makari, if the Waaagh! is active for your army, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Ghazghkull Thraka
units.loadout: Ghazghkull Thraka is equipped with: Mork’s Roar; Gork’s Klaw. Makari is equipped with: Makari’s stabba.

profiles.name: MAKARI
profiles.invulnerable_description: You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model.

datasheet.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
datasheet.description: If this unit is in your army, its Ghazghkull Thraka model must be your Warlord.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Painboy
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: power klaw; ’urty syringe.

datasheet.name: Grot Orderly
datasheet.description: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.Designer’s Note: Place a Grot Orderly token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used|Wargear||

datasheet.name: Dok’s Toolz
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!’
datasheet.description: Each time an attack made by this model with its ’urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding VEHICLE units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.|Datasheet||

units.name: Boyz
units.loadout: The Boss Nob is equipped with: slugga; big choppa. Every Boy is equipped with: slugga; choppa.

datasheet.name: Get Da Good Bitz
datasheet.description: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: BODYGUARD
datasheet.description: If this unit has a Starting Strength of 20, you can attach up to two Leader units to it instead of one (but only if one of those is a WARBOSS model). If you do, and this unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units with their original Starting Strengths.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Gretchin
units.loadout: Every Runtherd is equipped with: slugga; Runtherd tools. Every Gretchin is equipped with: grot blasta; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Runtherd
datasheet.description: While this unit contains one or more Gretchin models, each time an attack targets this unit, Runtherd models in this unit have a Toughness characteristic of 2.

datasheet.name: Thievin’ Scavengers
datasheet.description: At the start of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it (excluding Battle-shocked units). If one or more of those rolls is a 4+, you gain 1CP.|Datasheet||

units.name: Burna Boyz
units.loadout: Every Spanner is equipped with: close combat weapon; big shoota. Every Burna Boy is equipped with: burna; cuttin’ flames.

datasheet.name: Pyromaniaks
datasheet.description:
Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack with a burna that targets an enemy unit within 6", re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is also within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.|Datasheet||
000000020|1|000003676||||Faction||
000000020|2|||Tank Hunters|Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||
000000020|3|||Bomb Squigs|Twice per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.Designer’s Note: Place two Bomb Squig tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this unit uses this ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Tankbustas
units.loadout: The Boss Nob is equipped with: 2 rokkit pistols; choppa.Each Tankbusta is equipped with: rokkit launcha; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Pulsa Rokkit
datasheet.description: Once per battle, when the bearer’s unit is selected to shoot in your Shooting phase, the bearer can use its pulsa rokkit. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit by 1.|Wargear||

datasheet.name: ATTACHED UNIT
datasheet.description: If a CHARACTER unit from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a LOOTAS unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.|Fortification (левая колонка)||

units.name: Nobz
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; big choppa.

datasheet.name: Da Boss’ Ladz
datasheet.description: While a WARBOSS model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Ammo Runt
datasheet.description: Once per battle for each ammo runt this unit has, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.Designer’s Note: Place the relevant number of Ammo Runt tokens next to the unit, removing one each time the unit uses this ability.|Wargear||

units.name: Nob With Waaagh! Banner
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom shoota; Waaagh! banner.

datasheet.name: Plant the Waaagh! Banner
datasheet.description: Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of the next battle round, this model’s unit gains the benefits of the Waaagh! ability as if you had called a Waaagh! this battle round.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Da Boss Iz Watchin’
datasheet.description: While this model is gaining the benefits of the Waaagh! ability, it has a 4+ invulnerable save and an Objective Control characteristic of 5.|Datasheet||

units.name: Nobz On Warbikes
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: twin dakkagun; choppa; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Drive-by Krumpin'
datasheet.description: Each time this unit Consolidates, each model in this unit can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: SPEED FREEKS MOB
datasheet.description: If a model from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a WARBIKERS unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Meganobz
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: kustom shoota; power klaw.

datasheet.name: Krumpin’ Time
datasheet.description: While the Waaagh! is active for your army, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.|Datasheet||

units.name: Kommandos
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; choppa.

datasheet.name: Distraction Grot
datasheet.description: Once per battle, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, before making a saving throw for a model in this unit, it can deploy the distraction grot. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.Designer’s Note: Place a Distraction Grot token next to the unit, removing it when this unit uses this ability.|Wargear||

datasheet.description:

000002500|2|000008424||||Faction|2|
000002500|3|||Malefic Maelstrom (Psychic)|While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.|Datasheet||
000002500|4|||Glimpse of Eternity (Psychic)|Once per turn, you can change the result of one Hit roll, one Wound roll, one Damage roll or one saving throw made for this model to an unmodified 6.|Datasheet||
000002501|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000002501|2|||Annihilator|Each time a ranged attack made by this model is allocated to a MONSTER or VEHICLE model, you can re-roll the Damage roll.|Datasheet||
000002507|1|000008345||||Core||
000002507|2|000008466||||Faction||
000002507|3|||Impetuous Fervour|Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.|Datasheet||
000002507|4|||Sacred Banner|You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||
000002507|5|||Simulacrum Imperialis|At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.|Wargear||
000002509|1|000008452||||Faction||
000002509|2|||Masters of Close Confines|Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets the closest eligible target, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||
000002509|3|||NAVY BODYGUARD|If your Army Faction is not AGENTS OF THE IMPERIUM, then for each VOIDFARERS CHARACTER unit you include in your army, you can include one VOIDSMEN-AT-ARMS unit in your army that does not count towards the number of RETINUE units your army can include (see Assigned Agents)|Special (правая колонка)||

000002518|4|||Swift Onslaught|While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit|Datasheet||
000002518|5|||Martial Inspiration|Once per battle, in your Charge phase, this model’s unit it eligible to declare a charge in a turn which it Advanced.|Datasheet||

000002519|5|||Golden Laurels|While this model is leading a unit, each time a melee attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Deffkoptas With Big Shootas
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: slugga; twin big shoota; spinnin' blades.

datasheet.name: Deff from Above
datasheet.description: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.|Datasheet||

units.name: Da Red Gobbo’s Surprise
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom grot blasta; close combat weapon.

datasheet.name: Explosive Presents (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a friendly GRETCHIN unit is within 6" of this model, that unit has the GRENADES keyword and, each time such a unit uses the Grenade Stratagem, add 1 to the result of each dice rolled to see how many mortal wounds are inflicted.|Datasheet||
000003691|5|||Da Revolushun!|Once per battle round, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly GRETCHIN unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grotmas Gitz
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: bludgeoning bag of gifts; massive gift-filled gob.

core.name: Bludgeoning Cheer
core.description: Each time this model ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. That enemy unit must then take a Battle-shock test.
core.parameter: 000003692 | 5 | | | Bludgeoning Cheer | Each time this model ends a Normal, Advance, Fall Back or Charge move, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll six D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound. That enemy unit must then take a Battle-shock test. | Datasheet | |

datasheet.name: Gifts for All! (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While a GRETCHIN unit is within 6" of this model, that unit’s Thievin’ Scavengers ability is successful on D6 rolls of 2+, instead of rolls of 4+.|Datasheet||
000003693|1|000008346||||Core||
000003693|2|000008369||||Faction||
000003693|3|||Resurrection Orb|Once per battle, while the bearer is leading a unit, at the end of any phase, it can resurrect that unit if it is on the battlefield. When you do, that unit’s Reanimation Protocols are activated, reanimating D6 wounds rather than D3 when doing so. You cannot resurrect more than one unit per turn.|Wargear||
000003693|4|||My Will Be Done|Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.|Datasheet||
000003693|5|||Translocation Shroud|Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit. In addition, each time a model in that unit makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, until that move is finished, it can move horizontally through models and terrain features (it cannot finish a move on top of another model or its base).|Datasheet||

units.name: Big Mek
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: kustom-mega blaster; power klaw.

units.name: Ufthak Blackhawk
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: shokk rifle; snazzhammer; Princess’ jaws.

units.name: Breaka Boyz
units.loadout: The Boss Nob is equipped with: rokkit pistol; smash hammer; choppa.Each Breaka Boy is equipped with: smash hammer.

datasheet.name: Trophy Hunters
datasheet.description: Each time this unit declares a charge, you can re-roll the Charge roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Bomb Squigs
datasheet.description:
Twice per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.Designer’s Note: Place two Bomb Squig tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this unit uses this ability.|Datasheet||
000003861|4|||ATTACHED UNIT|If a CHARACTER unit from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a BOYZ unit, it can be attached to this unit instead.|Special (правая колонка)||
000003862|1|000008336||||Core||
000003862|2|000008445||||Faction||
000003862|3|||Death is Not Enough|In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks destroyed an enemy model, that enemy model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.|Datasheet||
000003862|4|||Cruel Amusement|In your Shooting phase, one model from your army with this ability can use it. If they do, until the end of the phase, select one of the following abilities to apply to that model’s shrieker cannon: [IGNORES COVER] [PRECISION] [SUSTAINED HITS 3]|Datasheet||
000003863|1|000008346||||Core||
000003863|2|000008337||||Core||
000003863|3|000008445||||Faction||
000003863|4|||Fog of Dreams (Psychic)|While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.|Datasheet||
000003863|5|||Twilight Pathways (Psychic)|At the start of your Movement phase, one model from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that model’s unit and that model’s unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.|Datasheet||
000003864|1|000008340||||Core||
000003864|2|000008336||||Core||
000003864|3|000008445||||Faction||
000003864|4|||Blitz|Once per battle, in your Movement phase, this model can use this ability before it makes a Normal move. If it does, until the end of the turn, add 2D6" to this model’s Move characteristic and add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Solitaire weapons.|Datasheet||
